full_summary:
## NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)
### Standing Rapid Deployment Team (SRDT) Training

**Reference Number:** cb-5821-39333681
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 23-222344
**Publication Date:** May 24, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** July 6, 2023 (2:00 PM)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** August 1, 2023 (anticipated)
**Expected Contract End Date:** July 31, 2024

### Overview

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) seeks a contractor to provide specialized educational services for the training of Standing Rapid Deployment Teams (SRDT). The training will equip Government of Canada employees with the knowledge and skills necessary to manage difficult circumstances related to deployments.

### Scope of Work

The successful contractor will be responsible for delivering 37.5 hours of classroom training to Government of Canada employees. The training will be divided into up to three (3) sessions per year, and the contractor will be responsible for the preparation and delivery of each session.

### Requirements

The tender is subject to the following requirements:

* Competitive - Open Bidding
* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Key Details

* **Procurement Category:** Service
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements:** Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Tendering Information

* **Contact Person:** Trent Clemenhagen, (343) 203-1308, [trent.clemenhagen@international.gc.ca](mailto:trent.clemenhagen@international.gc.ca)
* **Tender Documents:** Available at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5821/rfp-23-222344.pdf

### Attachment

The tender notice and documentation can be found at the above-mentioned URL.

Note: I made some minor reorganization of text and added headings to improve readability. Also, I assumed that the tender is still open since the "tender closing date" section is not indicated as "expired". 

Please let me know if this meets your expectations. Let me know if you have any other requirements.  I'd be happy to revise it further.
